Portfolio Projects

Since 2016 I have been working to build my skillset as a software developer. My primary work has been through the development of learning projects with a mindset to seek understanding in all aspects of creating a complete software system.

FudgetBudget

Project Overview

FudgetBudget is a personal budgeting tool designed to show a running balance of future transactions. By inputing all your income and expenses, and defining how often they occur, transactions are projected into the future and the resulting balance calculated. These projections can be individually adjusted to achieve your financial goals/needs; whether they be to maintain a minimum balance, plan for future expenses, handle unexpected expenses, identifying expendable funds, and more.

Technical Overview

FudgetBudget was developed using the Android Framework, implementing a form of Model-View-ViewModel architecture with LiveData updates. The primary object of the program is the Transaction, from which Projections are created, from which Records are created, and the balance is based on the sum of all Records.

Simpledoc

Project Overview

The purpose of Simpledoc is to model a heirarchical organization and the roles within it, for use with modular tools designed to automate programatic tasks of the organization.

For example: the documentation module allows for creation of a form which can be assigned to people with a specific role, of a specific set of the organization, to be completed at a specific frequency. The module would handle prompting the appropriate users assigned to those roles, to complete the form when it is due. It would prompt the user's supervisor if it is out of compliance. If the form requires review by another with a specific role after submission, that person would be notified of the need for their review. This requires no time by the supervisor to know the state of compliance, where it would otherwise require regular monitoring by the supervisor of the rule crossreferenced with submitted paperwork.

Modular tools to be used with the organization model may include: communications, documentation, task management, training material, scheduling, and more.

Technical Overview

Technical Overview of Simpledoc is in progress.

Demo

Simpledoc is only partially functional at this time. There is a lot of work behind the UI where I developed my knowledge of a full stack application and designed the business and technical logic of how this idea could be implemented. It was my initial learning project I worked on until I felt I had the skills to develop a smaller project to functional completion in preperation for transitioning into a career in software development.
